thought: To craft a stone_brick_slab, I first need to craft 3 stone bricks. Stone bricks require 4 stone blocks, which are crafted from cobblestone. Therefore I need to smelt the cobblestone in slot 39 to get a stone block. I will place it in slot 11.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 39 to slot 11 with quantity 1
